name: Wrong God
description:
Wrong God is an action-packed roguelike game that puts players in the shoes of a demon inadvertently summoned by an ancient cult. Deep within the catacombs, where the cult performed their rituals, a grave mistake leads to the summoning of an evil entity—the player's character. As this demon, you must now face the consequences and navigate through a treacherous underground labyrinth.

The game offers 30 levels of challenging gameplay, each generated randomly to ensure a unique experience with every playthrough. The catacombs are filled with a myriad of enemies, each presenting their own set of dangers and combat styles. From unholy creatures to cursed cultists, you will need to master your demon abilities and adapt your strategies to prevail.

Features
  • Mistaken Summoning: Assume the role of a demon mistakenly summoned by an ancient cult, and uncover the consequences of their error as you navigate through the deep catacombs.
  • Dynamic Weapon Changes: Be prepared for constant adaptation as your weapon changes every 5 seconds. Quickly adjust your combat strategy to utilize the strengths and weaknesses of each new weapon.
  • Randomly Generated Levels: Explore 30 unique levels that are randomly generated with each playthrough. No two runs will be the same, ensuring a fresh and unpredictable experience every time.
  • Diverse Enemies: Battle against a variety of enemies ranging from unholy creatures to cursed cultists. Each enemy type presents different challenges and requires strategic approaches to overcome.
  • Challenging Roguelike Gameplay: Test your skills and resilience as you face relentless challenges in the unforgiving catacombs. With permadeath and limited resources, every decision matters as you strive to survive and rectify the cult's mistake.
